about_description:
AOEngine Tools v2.0.0
GAMMA Integration Edition

A unified launcher for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Anomaly modding.

Components:
‚Ä¢ GAMMA Installer - Install STALKER GAMMA modpack
‚Ä¢ AOEngine Launcher - Manage AOEngine files
‚Ä¢ Uploader Tool - Developer release management
language_changed_message: Language has been changed. Please restart the application for full effect.
gamma_welcome_text:
Welcome to the Gigantic Automated Modular Modpack for Anomaly installer

Be sure to check out the discord #how-to-install channel for full instructions:
https://www.discord.gg/stalker-gamma

Untick Check MD5 ONLY if your pack is already working and you want to update it.

Check the update status above and click Install/Update GAMMA if needed.

Currently working from the directory:
gamma_mods_list_placeholder:
Mod list will be displayed here after installation.

Features:
‚Ä¢ View all installed mods
‚Ä¢ Check mod status (enabled/disabled)
‚Ä¢ See mod versions
‚Ä¢ Enable/disable individual mods
gamma_updates_placeholder:
GAMMA update detection will be shown here.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Check for new GAMMA releases
‚Ä¢ View changelog
‚Ä¢ One-click update
‚Ä¢ Version comparison
gamma_moddb_updates_placeholder:
Individual mod update detection will be shown here.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Check each mod for updates on ModDB
‚Ä¢ Update individual mods
‚Ä¢ Batch update all outdated mods
‚Ä¢ View mod descriptions and changelogs
gamma_backup_placeholder:
Backup management will be available here.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Create backups before updates
‚Ä¢ Restore previous installations
‚Ä¢ Manage backup storage
‚Ä¢ Backup compression
